problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the known straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight line, n and the straight line a, b, c intersect at the points A, C, E, B, D, F respectively, AC = N_0, CE = N_1, BD = N_2. Then BF = ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理．题目比较简单,解题的关键是注意数形结合思想的应用．
